abstract: The American International Group said Monday that it has hired Peter D. Hancock, a veteran financial services executive, as an executive vice president overseeing the insurer’s finance and risk.
snippet: The American International Group said Monday that it has hired Peter D. Hancock, a veteran financial services executive, as an executive vice president overseeing the insurer’s finance and risk.
lead_paragraph: The American International Group said Monday that it had hired Peter D. Hancock, a veteran financial services executive, as an executive vice president overseeing the insurer’s finance and risk.

headline.main: A.I.G. Hires Finance Veteran to Oversee Risk
